entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Store list of instantiated types in MIBC #78432
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Tracking issue: Jiterpreter cleanup and improvements #78428
  • CI rerun fails with "Artifact * already exists for build #." #78427
  • [API Proposal]: Idea for a convenient Replace. area-system-runtime #78423
  • [MONO][Marshal] Remove unused marshal-noilgen code #78422
  • VSMac Crash Reports Missing Frames #78421
    8.0.0
  • Enable more style checking analyzers #78414
  • Warn on analyzer crashes in runtime repo #78412
  • Debug symbols on Linux in Native AOT have lots of DWARF errors #78410
    8.0.0
  • Length calculation in objwriter looks suspicious #78409
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Replacing direct LoggerExtensions.Log* usage with source-generated logging methods #78406
    Future
  • Please add a function to Color such as Color.FromHDR(Long) for Visual Basic and Visual C# 2022. #78403
  • [Analyzer] Usage of ToString in logging source generator method call sites #78402
    Future
  • [Analyzer] Lift arrays of literals to static fields #78398
  • [Analyzer] Async methods that don't take a CancellationToken #78397
  • [Analyzer] Unawaited / returned tasks created with a disposable in using block for that disposable #78394
  • [Analyzer] Recommend string.StartsWith(c) instead of string.StartsWith("c") #78392
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `OperatingSystem.IsWasi()` #78389
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Make types declared in an executable internal #78388
  • Probable wrong codegen or stack corruption in .NET 7.0.0 #78387
  • Numerical < and == comparisons aren't fused into <= #78385
    8.0.0
  • Deadlock with SystemEvents when application is shutdown #78384
  • IComparer<T> constraint leads to worse codegen than IComparisonOperators<T,T,bool> constraint #78383
  • Uri.TryCreate returns true for relative Uri which contains non-valid characters #78381
  • [tests] System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests hitting Failed to sign the app on iOS device arm64 #78380
  • Self contained WPF app's cold start can be 2-3 seconds #78379
  • Regression in System.Tests.Perf_Boolean.TryParse #78408
  • Regressions in System.Collections.IterateForEach<String> #78407
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_File #78405
  • CA2007 for Durable function Orchestrations #78371
  • How to use the right certificate from a .NET Keystore for a .NET SSL application on linux #78369
  • .NET Native AOT warnings from System.Net.Http #78367
  • When a delegate is created from a `DynamicMethod`, the `Method` property returns a `MethodInfo` which does not implement `CreateDelegate` #78365
  • [release/6.0] Assertion failed in FormatHalf in Number.Formatting.cs in Linux musl #78361
  • Inlined ReadOnlySpan<char> parameter lacks string-like optimizations #78359
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Interpreter assertion failure for `System.Xml.RW.XmlWriterApi.Tests` with *AOT* #78358
  • Switches with intrinsic const aren't getting optimized #78356
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: ConfigurationBinder Testing Refactor #78353
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Random.Shuffle #78419
  • Test failure baseservices\exceptions\simple\ParallelCrashWorkerThreads\ParallelCrashWorkerThreads.cmd #77791
  • .NET 7: incorrect order of arguments when calling the `ConfigurationDebugViewContext` constructor #78306
    8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Android mono CI JIT failure: The following constructor parameters did not have matching fixture data: _Global globalVar #78360
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.StreamReaderReadLineTests #78401
  • Idea for a convenient Replace #78373
  • [Analyzer]: Unexpected allocation when converting arrays to spans #69577
    Future
  • [wasm] Test failing on nodejs - `SocketsHttpHandlerTest_HttpClientHandlerTest_Headers_Http11.ResponseHeaders_ExtraWhitespace_Trimmed` #77631
    8.0.0
  • Exception Thrown when combining Polymorphic Records /w JsonNamingPolicy.SnakeCaseLower #78366
  • Multiple mono JIT tests are failing on iOSSimulator in outerloop #64945
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] Retry when we fail to get the connection string from chrome #64931
    8.0.0
  • CLR-x86-JIT/V1-QFE, CLR-x86-JIT/V1.1-M1-Beta1, CLR-x86-JIT/V1.2-M01 (55 tests total) #78355

PullRequests

Created

  • Removing outdated unused r2rdump tests #78431
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • CreateSegment events #78430
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fixing typo in area-owners #78429
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #78426
  • Add sdcardfs to filesystems list #78424
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-consider, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Add check for interval->writeThru in the assert #78418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/7.0][PERF]Fix Mono Dotnet Generation #78413
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] source build backports #78395
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for BitOperations zero count #78391
    area-System.Numerics, 8.0.0
  • Don't inline anything in BBJ_THROW #78386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use compile time handle for instruction comments on xarch too #78382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove usage of ComPlus_ variables in tests #78377
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • new RID: wasi-wasm #78376
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Poof of concept port of interleave feature #78374
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT (#76109) #78372
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Don't emit frozen string literals for rare code paths #78370
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix the TimeSpan comment about internal representation. #78364
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use Helix's retry mechanism to re-run debugger tests on CI if .. #78357
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Updating fabricbot area pods #78415
    area-Meta
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] Bump 6.0.12 #78331
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Add workload win-arm64 support #78416
    area-Build-mono
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add workload win-arm64 support #78417
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Test for header trimming not supported on NodeJS #78375
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78400
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix Parameter order passed to ConfigurationDebugViewContext #78352
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Various support changes and cleanups for the jiterpreter PR #78225
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Trigger AVX-512 pipeline on PRs, not merges #78351
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [PERF] Fix mono dotnet creation #78257
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix handling generic custom attributes #78304
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Don't escape accented letters #78217
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Improve the handling of Create, CreateScalar, and CreateScalarUnsafe for vectors #78236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make JIT<->EE printing methods consistent and support nested classes when printing class names #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [wasm][debugger][libs] Documentation: How to debug library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes around virtual method hierarchy validation #78157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding check on R2RDump #78343
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78004
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Linker into runtime2 #78077
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Rework the implementation of __arglist to be platform ind… #78329
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Set IsDynamicCodeCompiled as a managed constant to help #72762
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #78339
    area-System.Security
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use zero register in csel when possible #78330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Initial JIT test merging #78259
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 take 2 #78247
    NO-MERGE, area-Serialization, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: What is SCALED_ADDR_MODES #2089

Updated

  • [Bug] [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Unable to compile native WebAssembly library #2073
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] Disable Reflection, IL scanner, RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #1992

PullRequests

Created

  • Add deep stack test and reduce standard stack depth #2088

Merged

  • Fix a couple of things #2080
    area-green-threads
  • Filament/prolog debug #2069
    area-green-threads
  • NatvieAOT-LLVM: Update the image for prepare-signed-artifacts.yml #2087
  • Fix Yield again #2086

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Process blocks in SSA dominance to fix CSE mapping issue #2042
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload --source looks for bad semver if you provide a faulty URL #29078
  • `dotnet tool install -a arm64` fails on linux-arm64 #29074
  • 50x slower build with .net 6.0.403 compared to 6.0.402 #29071
  • Add dotnet7 in Ubuntu 22.04 jammy repository #29069
  • manpages should live in installer repo so they are included in .deb, .rpm, .tar.gz and macOS .pkg #29067

Closed

  • dotnet workload install always displays "The machine has a pending reboot. Installation will continue, but you may need to restart." #28993
  • Shared resources (resx) does not work in .net core 3.1 and VS 16.4 #4033
  • Unable to install .NET 7 on Ubuntu 22.04.1 on WSL #28995
  • dotnet nuget update source has user unfriendly behaviour #29026
  • Workloads: Feed authentication during install doesn't seem to work at all on macOS #25458
    7.0.2xx
  • dotnet test doesn't respect platform override anymore #29076
  • Latest VS2022 Preview update breaks everything #29037
  • Razor build server (process 27970) failed to shut down: The shutdown command failed: The application to execute does not exist #10573
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] fixed dotnet/templating#5600 "No templates found" when required parameter is missing #29070
    Servicing-approved, Area-dotnet new, 7.0.1xx
  • Fix typo in WebSocketScriptInjection.js #29073
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix TargetPlatformVersion normalization for Windows #29009
    Servicing-rejected
  • Clean up Razor Server pid file if the path doesn't exist #29029
    Area-CLI
  • fixed error reporting #29068
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix templating support for multiple parameters with same prefix #29027
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Add error when specifying --output option for a solution #29065
    Area-CLI
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use CodeAnalysis.Simplification to expand and reduce generated subtrees. Add tests to cover CSharpFileBuilder and CSharpSyntaxWriter classes. #29058
    Area-GenAPI
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29011
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2045591 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined. (#28380) #29052
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29041
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Update man pages post 7.0 GA #29032
  • Simplify output testing #28994
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Update the Dictionary and related classes to work similar to ValueTuple with regards to element names. #6717
  • [API Proposal]: "that" syntax for shorter single-line conditionals. #6715
  • Introduce a new ??? operator for evaluating null/empty/whitespace only strings with a single check, with 30% less code to write than currently and increased code clarity #6713

PullRequests

Merged

  • Clarify lambda defaults/`params` breaking change langversion #6682

Updated

  • Create roles-2022-11-10.md #6708

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS2022 Preview + Extension issues #65444
    17.5
  • MissingMethodException when calling method prior to hot reload change #65442
    Backlog
  • Throw in CPSProjectFactory.GetIntermediateAssemblyPath #65439
    17.5
  • Compiler should elide null checks when it's provable they're unnecessary #65435
    C# 12.0
  • Type `T[]*` reports parser error #65429
    17.5
  • `ERR_AssgReadonlyStatic` only under `#nullable enable` #65428
  • Add more Go To Def telemetry #65427
  • Documentation Xml does not contain documentation from Source Generators generated code #65426
    17.5

Closed

  • Question: nuget package release schedule #65295
  • `NotNullIfNotNullAttribute` does not work when a methodgroup is passed to `IEnumerable<>.Select` #65000
  • File types should work with EnC #61999
    17.4
  • RoslynDeployment on main branch isn't usable #64587
  • Allow [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute in source #63904
    17.5
  • Exception in `CSharpAddParameterCheckCodeRefactoringProvider` when changing type of indexer argument #63307
    Backlog
  • CodeGenerator.TryEmitReadonlySpanAsBlobWrapper - doesn't record dependencies from UseSiteInfo for utilized well known methods #61631
    Compiler.Next
  • InvalidOperationException from `DiagnosticData.GetAdditionalLocations` #65381
  • when a function includes both a ref and out parameter CS8352 is now thrown #65417

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor cleanup in OptionStore #65450
    Area-IDE, Community
  • WIP: Support new all-in-one-symbol-search APIs. #65449
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65447
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65445
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Convert parser warning into a binding warning. #65440
    Area-Compilers
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` feature #65438
    Area-Compilers
  • Add unit test entrypoint to just find a single result #65437
    Area-IDE
  • Consult secondary index to avoid looking in a document for unit-test matches. #65436
    Area-IDE
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Allow usage of ref structs in VB despite CompilerFeatureRequired #65431
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Semantic snippets - fix bug where user-created snippets were getting filtered out #65448
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65443
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65446
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.5 #65374
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add back -vs-deps to `PublishData.json` #65441
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Prepare lambda defaults/`params` for merging to `main` #65409
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix crash in parameter refactoring #63351
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Document defaults/`params` delegate type inference breaking change #65300
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure emit layer doesn't ignore diagnostics and dependencies for well known members. #65320
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Stop shipping `-vs-deps` branches #65376
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Gracefully handle additional locations in DiagnosticData.Create #65434
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, Next
  • Report structural lambda `params` errors #64960
    Area-Compilers
  • Clarify breaking change for safe-to-escape of ref struct returned from method invocation #65418
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps back to main #65425
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65413
    Area-Compilers
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65385
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Optimize codegen for tuple swap scenarios #65327
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Allow multiline override #65395
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic Snippets - else snippet #65178
    Area-IDE
  • Implicitly-typed lambda parameters have RefKind.None #65350
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data"" #64892
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure the causing syntax node is always in the timing dictionary #65321
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.5
  • 17.4: Convert symbol-search crash to NFW #65280
    Area-IDE
  • Correct `Nullable<T>.Equals()` calls in `BoundNode.Update()` #65398
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Refine error recovery in the parser around top level statements #65262
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Report analyzer telemetry for lightbulb code path in OOP #65212
    Area-Analyzers
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move SRM to 6.0.1 #65416
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.5

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BuildFromSource Windows Activate for VS #45119
  • SignalR should allow managing of connections by UserGroup #45114
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI + Blazor | Navigating away / Breaking Circuit causes "generic JS exception" #45112
  • MAUI + Blazor | IOS Release throws on virtual Parameter setter #45111
  • net7: Razor class library - Missing CSS bundle in published package when built using msbuild /maxCpuCount #45108
  • Blazor server login form doesn't see values inputted by password manager #45106
    Backlog
  • Logs filled with critical exceptions from Kestrel/Quic #45105
  • Lazy loaded `BlazorCustomElements.js` file does not adhere to the `loadBootResource` configuration #45104
    Backlog
  • Results.Created returns a relative URI in the location header instead of an absolute (as in classic Web API) #45101
  • NET 6 Blazor WASM Hosted - Query diminishing performance #45100
  • Net 7.0 Connection processing ended abnormally. #45110
  • Asp.Net Core API controller memory leak #45098
    Discussions

Closed

  • HttpResponse Doesn't Allow Negative Value for Cookie Max-Age #45045
    8.0-preview1
  • Unable to configure HTTPS endpoint #45023
  • Blazor Webassembly is broken out of the box #44902
  • UsePathBase does not work as expected in .NET 6 #45076
  • Feature request: strongly-typed route values in `a` tag-helpers #35376
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Give support of writing typescript instead just JavaScript in inline script for .cshtml pages. Also allow to have inheritance there as code can be re-used in all pages. #45103
  • Can you reopen my issue 44088 ? #45107
  • @bind:after is not working #45050
  • Invoking endpoint filter but not handler on argument error causes VoidTaskResult to be written to the response body #45040
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/3.1] Use simpler Docker tags #45118
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/7.0] Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45109
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Use restore.cmd to Restore the Project #45026
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Support max-age negative value #45099
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Use simpler Docker tags #45115
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Use simpler Docker tags #45117
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update Microsoft.Build.* dependencies to 17.4 #45116
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Update 7.0 SiteExtension version #45113
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix SiteExtension loading on App Service #44987
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45073
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Remove array allocation from multi-span header parsing #45044
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Support checking for required members in minimal APIs #45084
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2045941 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature Request]dotnet-symbol should print the module name when symbols can't be found #3509
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [dsrouter] Implement a WebSocket server #3422
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add websocket modes to dotnet-dsrouter #3461
  • Moderenize triggerdump in docs #3507

Updated

  • Add the ALC to `DumpMT` #3508

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android precompile failed for visualstudio.rpccontracts.dll #11397

  • iOS app startup slow in debug #11392

    Backlog
  • MAUI 7.0 iOS Release build won't install on iOS 16 #11385
  • Intercepting requests from BlazorWebView #11382
    .NET 8 Planning

    Backlog
  • UIDeviceFamily 6 breaks Mac Catalyst UI #11377
    Backlog
  • Slow builds on Mac M1 #11376
    Backlog
  • Unable to click a MenuItem programmatically through UI Automation #11375
    Backlog
  • CollectionView shows no ScrollBar #11369
    Backlog
  • Building IOS Release generate error "the selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects" #11368
    Backlog
  • Build of MAUI app fails if NuGet package contains references #11364
    Backlog
  • [iOS] CollectionView inside RefreshView freezes app completely #11363
    Backlog
  • [IOS] Controllers do not appear on ContentPage Set FlowDirection Right To Left #11362

Closed

  • Label not changing text #11325

  • [Android] Entry control: Closing onscreen keyboard manually resizes modal page height #10978
    Backlog

    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Picker on windows not load in MVVM #11343
  • [IOS] Maui .Net7 Debug Crashing on Physical Device - The app has been terminated. #11324
  • Xcode 14.1 not compatible whit VS 2022 #11348
  • IOS Content and Controls inside Frame not Showing #11351
  • .NET MAUI App Icon and Splash screen cannot be customized #10949

    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞

  • Update Essentials AppActions API Docs #11373
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Accelerometer API Docs #11370
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Possible fix for issue #10960 #11361
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 7.0 Question - Can IQueryExpressionInterceptor actually use scoped data? #29573
  • Json: predicate on json bool property generates incorrect sql #29572
    8.0.0
  • EFCore 7.0 Bug - Invalid Operation Exception RE "Temporary Value" #29570
  • EF 7 Navigation propeties fixup #29568
  • Compiler warning about System.Text.Json after upgrading to EfCore 7 #29567
  • [EF6 + OData] Calculate total count: Nullable object must have a value exception #29566
  • EFCore 7 - SqlServer - Git test TPTTableSplittingSqlServerTest.Can_query_shared is generating different foreign key constraint when compared to EFCore 6 #29564
  • Invalid configuration when scaffolding a manytomany table with underscore in fieldname #29563
  • Batched query breaks after upgrade to 7.0 - The UPDATE statement conflicted with the FOREIGN KEY constraint #29562
  • Lazy building of internal runtime model #29561

Closed

  • Adding an existing item to a many-to-many relationship with a custom join entity does not get fixed up by the change tracker #29554
  • Crash while scaffolding in EF7 when no primary key set on ManyToMany table #29569
  • [EF7] Method not found: ... Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Conventions.ConventionSet.get_ModelFinalizingConventions() #29557
  • EF generates additional mapping to the same sql column with '1' postfix in column name #29503
  • ManyToMany not working if the joint entity is explicitly set #29493
  • ... #29481
  • ("Hello, World!") #29480
  • Parallel requests in asp core with EF core produce FOREIGN KEY constraint conflict #29387
  • SqlNullabilityProcessor throwing NullReferenceException on one server in cluster #29340
  • Sqlite: Invalid SQL for reused alias? #27129
  • EF Core Interceptors not working with async commit #29560

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Use simpler Docker tags #29575
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Fix to #29572 - Json: predicate on json bool property generates incorrect sql #29574
    auto-merge
  • Make DbUpdateException.Entries empty when we can't populate it #29571
  • Fix SQL Server result mapping for bulk insert #29565

Merged

  • Add test for ExecuteUpdate with two inner joins #29522
    auto-merge

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Use simpler Docker tags #29576
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/2.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29433
